text: Nde tɨvi mbatɨgi ga mbui ndegi ma. Nde maaŋ mbuav, nde guigira bigir vhuuiŋra wari won tarir nɨɨngeŋ kaŋgi. Nde mba tɨvar vhuun wari won tari ga mbui. Nde guigira khueŋ kaŋgiri, nden Ndia Bakɨme, ana mbu Hevenan ki, ana guigira wo Ŋina Ŋaarar ana phorga nzuav anan nzai gumgir nɨɨngen ndikndigi.”
